message.subject: Hi
message.content:
M1.1. Stinson,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. This is the person from UT I mentioned.
[Inform: someone, presumably Zeigham, is the person from U Texas that Vince mentioned to Stinson earlier]
M1.3. He is not interested in the summer
internship.
[Inform: this person from UT is not interested in the summer internship]

message.subject: Hi
message.content:
M2.1. Zeigham,
[Conventional: salutation]
M2.2. We discussed two options (not necessarily mutually exclusive):
[Inform: Vince and Zeigham had discussed two options for Zeigham]
M2.3. 1. summer internship
M2.4. 2. full employment.
[Inform: the two options were a summer internship or full employment]
M2.5. Are you interested exclusively in full employment?
[Request-Information: is Zeigham interested only in full employment]
Flink2.5
M2.6. I need the answer ASAP, as we are going to discuss the additional summer
intern positions this afternoon. [Y]
[Inform: Vince needs the answer ASAP, because open summer intern positions will be discussed this afternoon]
M2.7. Vince
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Hi
message.content:
M3.1. Vince:
[Conventional: salutation]
M3.2. I think full time employment starting in about six months seems to be the
best option.
[Inform: Zeigham prefers full employment in 6 months]
Blink2.5
M3.3. It is probably best to get my dissertation wrapped up before
taking on additional commitments.
[Inform: Zeigham would like to finish his dissertation before starting any work]
M3.4. Regards
M3.5. Zeigham
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Hi
message.content:
M4.1. FYI
[Inform: something presumably attached (probably message 3 from Zeigham) is for Stinson's information]
M4.2. Vince
[Conventional: signature]
